thread.title: Chip Kelly, Philadelphia Eagles vs. New York Giants: Monday Night Football live updates, game chat
thread.title_full: Chip Kelly, Philadelphia Eagles vs. New York Giants: Monday Night Football live updates, game chat | OregonLive.com

author: Tim Brown | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Chip Kelly, Philadelphia Eagles vs. New York Giants: Monday Night Football live updates, game chat
text:
Former Oregon Ducks head coach Chip Kelly and the Philadelphia Eagles kick off the final game of Week 6 of the 2015 NFL season with a return home to the Lincoln Financial Field in Philadelphia where they'll face Eli Manning and the New York Giants on Monday Night Football. Kickoff is at 5:30 p.m. PT, TV on ESPN (Comcast/Xfinity channel 35, or 735 for HD).
More : TV channel and how to watch this game online
Follow along as we bring you live updates and analysis from the game from kickoff through the final whistle in the comments section below. Have thoughts on how Kelly and his eagles are performing? Don't hesitate to jump in on the live updates and chat with us as the game rolls along.
